member.name: T:part_header
member.summary: Parses the raw header data in inputData in a part_header structure pointed to by header Pointer to the data to be parsedPointer to a part_header structure

member.name: M:Disc.MarkAsUsed(System.UInt64,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Marks the clusters between nOffset and nOffset + nSize as used (eg not empty) The starting positionThe amount of data in bytes to mark as used (will round to the nearset sector)The number of clusters marked as used. 1 Cluster = 32768 bytes (32k)

member.name: M:Disc.Read(System.Byte*,System.UInt32,System.UInt64,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Reads data from the iso into the buffer pointer A pointer to a char buffer that the data will be stored inThe amount of data to read in bytesThe offset at which to being the read operationIndicates whether the clusters being read should be marked as used (eg not empty). Defaults to TrueThe number of bytes read. Returns -1 if an error occurs

member.name: M:Disc.Close
member.summary: Closes the Wii ISO True if the ISO was successfully closed. Otherwise false

member.name: M:Disc.Open(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Opens the Wii ISO Whether or not the ISO should be opened in read only mode. Opening in read only mode will prevent the image file from being locked to other applications but any write actions to the image will failTrue if the ISO was successfully opened. Otherwise false

member.name: M:Disc.Dispose
member.summary: Destructor. Disposes of the Disc object

member.name: T:Disc
member.summary: Represents a Wii disc image (ISO) and contains most of the methods for working with the image
